comments.comment: ape ekama hayya budu saranai swamin wahansa.we like only the minority who love us.
comments.author: mahinda jayathilaka

comments.comment: Within a system which denies the existence of basic human rights, fear tends to be the order of the day. Fear of imprisonment, fear of torture, fear of death, fear of losing friends, family, property or means of livelihood, fear of poverty, fear of isolation, fear of failure. A most insidious form of fear is that which masquerades as common sense or even wisdom, condemning as foolish, reckless, insignificant or futile the small, daily acts of courage which help to preserve man's self-respect and inherent human dignity. It is not easy for a people conditioned by fear under the iron rule of the principle that might is right to free themselves from the enervating miasma of fear. Yet even under the most crushing state machinery courage rises up again and again, for fear is not the natural state of civilized man.
comments.author: Dinesh J

comments.comment: Darmayanwala kisima waradak nehe.mohommad nabithuma kiya sitiye mona rataka jewath wunath a rate nithiyata garu karamin darmayanwalata garu karamin jewath vimata.aka athakata ara saduwa bumidanaya kirimata nodi prasna kiriima loku wereddak.ath ape rata miyanmarayak novi.budunge darmaye jewath wannan viya yuthui.polowa vinasa wemin pawathina aka apita penne nehe.dawasa yanawa sathiya yanawa masaya yanawa awrudda yanawa.wegayen lokaya duwanne loke darmayangen minisawa vinasa kirima nisa.darmayak sill thiyaganna lokayata aithiyak nehe.darmayan awe mulu loka sathwayagema hodatai.ath ada wenne darma yuddayan pamanai.ath kawadawath apita dinanna behe darmayan walin ayuthu prayojana aragatthoth.indiyawe penne nedda higannu pirila.rate kakkussi nehe.kunuwela.aei jathi darma yudde nisa.bless akak nehe

replies.replyComment: Ruwani ko oya thawama uththara hoyanawada? Thaman jiwath wena rate maha jathiyata agamata hamuduruwarunta nigraha karanda epa mula amathak karala kisima kelehegunayak nathi ganata hoyala balaganda oyalage paramoarawath sinhala bouddayo thamai agama pawadila thawa anawa waradi adupadu hoyanda yan akane aththe thamanta hoda ratakata kapu pathe jara nokara salli katha nokiya inne nathuwa

Ruwsni mariyam oya me tika therum ganda mulinma oyage pram prawath me rate minissu pitin apu agamak oyala waladagena dan oya virudda wadi adahas idiripath karagen viwechanaya karanne thamange ayamai kiyala param parawa gana hoyala balaganda oyage mulath sinhala boudda thamai oyala mudalata kanda tikakata agama waladagaththu minissu lajjahawak nadda me ratema jiwath wela me ratema minissu ohoma viwechanaya karanda me hamuduruwo naththam oyala wage minissunta address na therunada agamakata giya kiyala paya gahala jiwath wen rate minissunta kelehegune thiyala jiwath wenda igenaganda mulinma para desak karayonge thiyenne para gathima thamai
Ruwani Mariyam hamuduruwarunta gahanakota sinhalayata wenas kam karanakota oyata ridenna Dan hariyata ridenawa neda?
Nishali Udeshika gotabe janadi pathi thumani oya thamai ape jivithe adarei godaaaaak

comments.comment: Oya golla bihikala budun awa kiyala ,bale aran pissu kelin nethiwa EMA nayakayata wagakeem ishta karanda ida  deela. Ivasanda.,bauddha saranla novee.paduve inda.  Ehema noonoth obalatath Bandaranayaka ghathanayata pasu athi unu parisaraya athi wevi Bauddha gihi samajaya nivatayo nevei.bodu gihi apita vishala prasnayak lanai vinayak athiwa had a ganda. amarui .guruwarayai sanghayai vinayen pirihunoth samajayama pirihenawa.obala usavi neethi reethi hallu karala adrsa denawa.game.ape lamai,punchirala obalawa adarseta gaththoth ape  lamayinuth,punch I ralath  hire lagindada? silvath bhikshun tath danum therum. athi bodu gihi ayatah obala maha vinayak nihandawa katha karala prasna visandanda. haki eka, high part,udgosana dala samajaya awull karanawa.obala gihiwa hitiyanam kalakanni pathala karayo nethnam ,desapalana baleta game kasippu perana nadethami.madyastha P.padawa,Ratana / dadagga sutra nithara bhavitha karamin,hikmeemak athiwa,ratata. getalu visanda ganeemata nivaradi.maga penwamin Prayojanawath pudgalaek Wenda,rata samajaya. reka wada geniema api kageth waga keemak, sivuru bale kiyala avineetha wela heena manen dangalala ammatath,Agamatath Ratatah,Jathiyatath niggrha Katanga epa.oba wahanselama itu kala yuthu vishala samaja vaga keemak thibeawa, demala basin saralawa dharmaya,bhawanawa pahada demata ,bodu katautu amathyanse sahayath aran wada arabanda,kaka nikan innakota olu mongal veemata hondama behetha vedagath vedak oluwata baraganda oni ova radikal karayanta baha,obala silvath nisa obalata puluwan.baudda  dharmaya sinhalaya t√† pamanak seema  nokara, an ayatth  denuma ganda wada salasum karanda. api katholika ,Hindu, musl potha patha kiyawanawa  wage.meya ape pavidi samajayen ITU wiya utu wadagath karyak.paansakuleta,katineta,banata pamanak seema unoth api th. Dharmayath  silvath  sangha samajayath aduwegana yanawa wage pirisidu dahamath me raten nethi wei.
